example_sentence_english: I am looking for a new roof tile.
Tiles are missing on the roof.
We are buying some roof tiles.

example_sentence_italian: Il colore della tegola è chiaro.
example_sentence_english: The color of the roof tile is light.
I apply sealant to the roof tile.
Water drips from the roof tile.
There is a crack in the roof tile.
The cat sleeps on the roof tile.
He comes with the new roof tile.
Maintenance is needed for the roof tiles.
Leaves fall from the roof tiles.
Dust accumulates in the roof tiles.
I walk carefully on the roof tiles.

example_sentence_italian: Costruiamo il tetto con le tegole.
example_sentence_english: We build the roof with the tiles.
